question:
Match Column - I with Column - II. Select the option with correct combination.

| Column - I | Column - II |
|---|---|
| 1. Standing state | p. Mass of living material at a given time. |
| 2. Pioneer species | q. Amount of nutrients in the soil at a given time. |
| 3. Detritivores | r. Species that invade a bare area. |
| 4. Standing crop | s. Breakdown detritus into smaller particles. |
explanation: Standing state = nutrients in soil (q). Pioneer species = invade bare area (r). Detritivores = breakdown detritus (s). Standing crop = mass of living material (p).
